title: Crack Potatoes
directions: Combine all ingredients in a large mixing bowl and stir until mixed.
Spread into a 9Ã—13 pan lined with foil (or sprayed with cooking spray), and bake for approximately 50-60 minutes.
Optional: sprinkle a little shredded cheese on top before serving.
ingredients: 3 c. shredded cheese (I used 2 c. colby jack + 1 c. sharp cheddar)
1 bag (28-30 oz) frozen shredded hash browns, thawed just enough so you can break them up to mix with the other ingredients.
